excerpt: "An AI firm has developed a smart senior care sensor that can securely monitor the daily activities of elderly persons and report emergencies instantly to caregivers and family members. A Vancouver-based startup specializing in artificial intelligence (AI) has introduced a smart fall alert system designed to monitor seniors and report emergencies instantly to their family or caregiver."
